content: Award The **Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct** (**20 Years**) **Medal** is a [decoration](/wiki/Awards_and_decorations_of_the_Singapore_Armed_Forces) awarded to a member of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) (SAF) (regardless of regular or [NSmen](/wiki/NSmen) status) who has completed 20 years of continuous service. A clasp is awarded for an additional 10 years of service, for a total of 30 years. ## Description - The ribbon is brown, with two thick central white stripes and three sets of four thin white stripes surrounding them. ## Service medals In the SAF, the medals for service are: - 5 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Good Service Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Good_Service_Medal) - 10 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (10 Years) Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Long_Service_and_Good_Conduct_(10_Years)_Medal) - 15 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (10 Years) Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Long_Service_and_Good_Conduct_(10_Years)_Medal) with 15 year clasp - 20 years - Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (20 Years) Medal - 25 years - [Long Service Medal (Military)](/wiki/Long_Service_Medal_(Military)_(Singapore)) - 30 years - Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (20 Years) Medal with 30 year clasp - Singapore MINDEF Factsheet: Review of SAF medals - Singaporean Army Medals Factsheet - [Singaporean orders and decorations](/wiki/Singaporean_orders_and_decorations) This Singapore-related article is a stub.
